system.description:
You become accustomed to the specialized etiquette and hierarchy of the sword fighting world.  You gain proficiency with the Culture skill. You also gain a Culture specialty called fencing protocol.

You can make a Culture (fencing protocol) check to attain various insights based on the culture of fencing, including:

  • Understanding dueling etiquette (no check required)

  • Knowledge of the allowed and prohibited techniques of different fencing schools (DC 10)

  • Identifying where another fencer trained by studying their technique (DC equal to their combat maneuver DC)

  • Identify the combat schools of another creature's known maneuvers, if any (DC equal to creature’s CR or level if it has no CR).

  • Other uses at the Narrator’s discretion.
